threads.name: Anonymous
threads.com:
New generation, new Pokemon to shiny hunt.

Seems like the easiest method is doing Outbreaks.

>What are Outbreaks?
Outbreaks are when a huge group of the same Pokemon spawn in an area. Each outbreak can have at least 120 Pokemon spawns. When you defeat a bunch of them, your shiny odds for that Pokemon are increased temporarily.

>How do Outbreaks spawn?
Similar to Legends Arceus, Outbreaks are tied to real world time passing.

>Are the starters and box legendaries shiny locked?
Yes.

>What are the shiny rates?
An image showing all the shiny rates will be posted below in the thread.

Share anything you caught, want to hunt or are currently hunting. Feel free to ask questions.

The games don't need to be good, they just need to exist as a template for Pokémon's more profitable product lines.
